windows: PC with processor better than Pentium 3.2 GHz / AMD Athlon FX 2.6 GHz or higher Minimum 512MB RAM (Over 1GB recommended) Windows XP SP2/ Vista/ 7 250MB of available hard-disk space (Over 1GB recommend), USB Port, CD-ROM drive,nVIDIA Geforce 7600GT or later / Ati X1600 series or later, 1024x768 pixels, 16-bit color display compatible monitor ,(1280x1024, 32-bit color display recommended)
